entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is mentioned as someone who is pointing out the angle between Mars and Neptune.

entities.name: mars
entities.description: Mars is mentioned as a planet that is making an interesting angle with Neptune.

entities.name: neptune
entities.description: Neptune is mentioned as a planet that Mars is making an interesting angle with.

entities.name: eagle owl
entities.description: An eagle owl is mentioned as the mode of transportation for Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is riding on the back of an eagle owl.

entities.name: ivy-covered house
entities.description: An ivy-covered house is mentioned as a destination that Harry and the eagle owl are flying towards.

relationships.description: Harry is riding on the back of an eagle owl.
Mars is making an interesting angle with Neptune.
Harry and the eagle owl are flying towards an ivy-covered house.
The eagle owl lands in a chair.
